Module com.calendarfx.app
Package com.serenitask.util.DatabaseManager

Class SettingsDAO

java.lang.Object
com.serenitask.util.DatabaseManager.SettingsDAO
public class SettingsDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for interacting with the 'settings' table in the database. Handles CRUD operations for application settings.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field

    Database connection object.

  • Field Details

    • connection

      private final Connection connection
      Database connection object.

  • Constructor Details

    • SettingsDAO

      public SettingsDAO()
      Constructor for SettingsDAO. Initializes the database connection and creates the 'settings' table if it doesn't exist.

  • Method Details

    • createTable

      private void createTable()
      Creates the 'settings' table in the database if it doesn't exist. Defines the table schema with columns for setting key-value pairs.

    • getSetting

      public String getSetting(String key, String defaultValue)
      Retrieves the value of a setting from the database. If the setting does not exist, the default value is returned.
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the setting to retrieve.
      defaultValue - The default value to return if the setting does not exist.
      Returns:
      The value of the setting.

    • saveSetting

      public void saveSetting(String key, String value)
      Saves a setting to the database. If the setting already exists, it is updated with the new value. If the setting does not exist, a new setting is inserted.
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the setting to save.
      value - The value of the setting to save.

    • settingExists

      private boolean settingExists(String key)
      Checks if a setting exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the setting to check.
      Returns:
      True if the setting exists, false otherwise.
